name: Kroll Bond Rating Agency, Inc.
membership: EU CRA Constituent Group of the Financial Information Services Division of the Software & Information Industry Association (FISD/SIIA); European Association of Credit Rating Agencies
memberOrga: Kroll Bond Rating Agency Europe Limited
goal: KBRA was established in 2010 in an effort to restore trust in credit ratings by creating new standards for assessing risk and by offering thorough and transparent ratings. KBRA provides the investment community with an alternative solution by delivering timely and in-depth research. KBRA is a full service rating agency whose mission is to set a standard of excellence and integrity. KBRA is the largest post-crisis credit rating agency in the world, and is keen on expanding its business internationally, especially in Europe.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: CRA Regulation and Policy, Capital Markets Union, Securitisation, SME Financing, Infrastructure Financing, Money Market Funds, GDPR, European Central Bank Policy
